value:
$WmMPID_サラ,ch07_11_Sara_F_Normal,Face|My mother and father are dead.
And they say it was my grandfather
who murdered my father.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Urghh... What is this power...$k$pThe might...of Niðavellir...
Fáf...nir...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Is that all? Absurd. One more country
claimed in my name! HAHAHAHA!$k$pHAHAha...hah... Hmph.$k$p$EFace_Anger|This isn't— Not here either. Where
is it?! What am I searching for?$k$p$EFace_Pain|It...eludes me still.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Brother!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ótr.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you all right? Is it another
headache again?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, I...feel like I'm on the verge
of remembering something...$k$pSomething before even waking
on that battlefield in ruin...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Don't overexert yourself, Brother.
Things so far in the past hardly
matter now, do they?$k$p$EFace_Smile|You are king of Niðavellir! What more
could anyone want?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|And what a spectacle you've made!
I followed as fast as I could, but you
seem to have ended things here...$k$pSo, where should we invade next?
Nifl? ...Múspell, perhaps?$k$pThe realm of the dead, the realm
of dreams... Take your pick! It will
all be yours eventually, Brother!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Anywhere will do. But first, you
went to collect Reginn from that
lot in Askr, didn't you? And?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ah, right. Let me explain...$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|
